Posts.Content: Dec 11, 2018 12:29AM Kancermenot wrote: I had a 'ridge that resembled a vein going from lumpectomy scar and down arm to my wrist. Surgeon referred me to physical therapy. Therapist says that it is axillary web syndrome or cording and slight lymphedema. I was given some exercises to do at home and scheduled for 6 therapy sessions. I'm going through chemo so mentally I can't do any additional appointments. I've had some relief doing exercise at home.
Posts.Title: Hard ridge after lumpectomy Sunshine1982 Kancermenot
